subject: Re: My order 12/04/2025
description_text:
To this may concern,
I ordered the
Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter
And, I was charged on December 4, 2025. I have not received a confirmation
email nor the product yet.

Can you tell me when this will be delivered?

Thank you.
Anslee Kling
706-836-8054

conversations.body_text: Hi Anslee Williams,    This is your logistics tracking link. Since you did not provide an email address, you did not receive the order confirmation and shipping notification. I have added this email address for you, and any future notifications will be sent to this email address.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELO2452551424YQ
